title: Aids: what everyone needs to know [Revised] (Captioned)
brief_description: An authoritative exploration of AIDS produced in cooperation with the UCLA AIDS Centre. Discusses symptoms, transmission, diagnosis, how the body becomes prone to other diseases and the increasing danger to the general population. A family in which the husband has AIDS share their feelings.
